p: Various phytochemicals were isolated, purified, and identified from the crude extracts of alkaloids, terpenes, flavonoids, various glycosides, and proteins (Table 1). Compounds with antiviral activity are present in many plants, e.g., rutin, a flavonoid glycoside common in different plants, is effective against avian influenza virus [ 48], HSV-1, HSV-2 [ 18], and parainfluenza-3 virus [ 49].
